WELCOME_PAGE_DESC: Keep the LockTill Notes which are in your heart and share them with only the ones you want.
NO_PHOTO_FOUND_DESC: You don’t have any photos to show. Please add photos to your LockTill Notes.
NO_VIDEO_FOUND_DESC: You don't have any video to show. Please add a video to your LockTill Notes.
NO_AUDIO_FOUND_DESC: You don't have any audio to show. Please add audio to your LockTill Notes.
TITLE: Title
NO_FAVRT_DESC: Add your most loved LockTill Note to see them here in favourite LockTill Notes list.
SETUP_FOUR_DIGIT_PIN: Enter your 6-digit security PIN. You'll be asked for it when you start your application.
ENTER_FOUR_DIGIT_PIN_LOGIN: Enter the 6-digit PIN you set for this account.
NAME: Name
SHARE_SECRET_WHEN_PASSED_AWAY: Share LockTill Note when passed away
PASSED_AWAY_TEXT_1: Before any LockTill Note is delivered to the people you select, we will verify if you are still living.
PASSED_AWAY_TEXT_2: We will send you periodic attempts to reach you, if we don’t hear from you after a certain period a representative will attempt to contact you, if that fails, we will contact the person you added as a second point of contact.
PASSED_AWAY_TEXT_3: Only they can view that information. We cannot view your LockTill Notes. We need your personal details to get going!
PASSED_AWAY_TEXT_ANOTHER_CONTACT: To ensure secrecy we will contact the second point of contact for verification before sharing LockTill Passing Notes.
PASSED_AWAY_TEXT_4: Before taking action, we will attempt to contact you multiple times by SMS, email and by sending you a letter to your listed address.
PASSED_AWAY_TEXT_5: We will only trigger the plan that you set up if you haven’t used your LockTill account for some time. Tell us how long we should wait before we do so.
BEYONDME_SETTING_CONFIG_TEXT: Your LockTill Passing settings are not configured.
RESET_PASSWORD_TEXT: Please enter your registered email with LockTill. We will send you a reset password link.
SYNCING_NOTE_TEXT: Please wait while we are syncing your LockTill Notes shared by your friends.
EMAIL_ADDRESS_TEXT: We sent you a verification code at
ALLOW_LOCATION_TEXT: LockTill needs to access your location so it can add address information to your LockTill Notes.
BACKUP_NOTES_TEXT: Back up your LockTill Notes and media to Backup Server so if you lose your iphone or switch to a new one, your LockTill Notes is safe. You can restore your LockTill Notes and media when you reinstall LockTill. Media and messages you back up are protected by LockTill end-to-end encrypted.
NO_NET_TEXT:
Slow or no internet connection
Please check your internet settings.
MAKE_ONE_FOR_EACH: Make one for each of your LockTill Notes
